title: Blank League of legends screen.
body: The basic problem I am having is I click on the launcher Icon - then basically wait for it to load and the only thing that happens is what I have posted in the link to this post. it comes up blank. I have tried re installing probably 3-5 times now and it literally stays the same. I have updated graphics drivers chip-set etc...I have re-installed DivX I have literally tried anything and everything if anyone has any ideas or has had this problem please let me know :) thank-you

replies.body: Have you tried letting it sit for around five minutes?
I have, for 20 minutes. Still doesn't work.

Is that Windows 10 Technical Preview?

You know that's a technical preview, right?
I don't know about him. I'm using WIndows 8.1

Oh man I just noticed, you're not the person who made this discussion.

Whoops.

How did you change your avatar for each message?

Anyway, as for your OS, Windows 8.1 is bad. Try running it in compatibility mode for 7.

Apparently disabling your AVG firewall, or setting it to interactive will load the patcher.

It didn't work for me though :(
